name: IHATE FLIES!
description:
SMASH THE FLIES AND CLOSE YOUR EYES!

-->This game was created in less than 24 hours for the Ludum Dare Jam 31.<-

--->You can also play and rate the game on the Ludum Dare Page:

---> http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-31/?action=p...

This game was made in about 14 hours - I couldn't manage to spend more time on the ludum dare jam this weekend. Therefore I'm very happy with the outcome of the game. Also I got a few friends to help me out with stuff.

~Description:

Do you hate flies? Soon you will!

This guy has a problem: Flies are terrorizing his appartment.

Luckily, he bought an flyswatter - now it's payback time!

~Info:

Move the flyswatter from left to right an try to kill all the flies! At the same time, you should make sure to close your eyes in the right moment, so that the flies won't get in your eyes!

-You will need a keyboard to play.

I made the most stuff by myself.

The following people helped me out and made this gamejam entry possible for me:

Raphael Klaas (Art)

Lars Engel (Help with Bugfixing (or Fly-fixing)

Alan Berger (Music)

All assets were made from scratch frot this game, except for the fly sound and the font.
